steps.text: Build a basic TODO API in Rust with create/list/complete/delete endpoints, an in-memory store, and integration tests.
Build a simple TODO web UI with list/add/complete interactions and clear empty/loading/error states.
Add CLI smoke checks and local run docs for the TODO app so contributors can validate API + UI together.
Finalize TODO app integration details, polish docs, and capture release-readiness checks before merge.
